dislikes: Asking permission for things already authorized

interaction_patterns.approval: Often says 'perfect' or moves to next task without much feedback
interaction_patterns.errors: Reports error messages, expects quick fix

format_rules: No markdown headers (# symbols) - Homebase doesn't render them
Use **bold** for emphasis (double asterisks on both sides)
Keep messages concise with clear sections
Explain why policies matter (compliance, liability, fairness)
Provide messages in 3 languages: English, Turkish, Mexican Spanish
Use --- as separator between language versions
